channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Donald Trump Orders Crackdown on Politically-Motivated ‘Debanking’
item.description: In a new executive order, the US president has called on federal regulators to investigate and punish banks for alleged discrimination against conserv...

item.title: Leak Reveals the Workaday Lives of North Korean IT Scammers
item.description: Spreadsheets, Slack messages, and files linked to an alleged group of North Korean IT workers expose their meticulous job-planning and targeting—and t...

item.title: xAI’s legal chief steps down after whirlwind year
item.description: Robert Keele said this week that he has stepped down as xAI’s head of legal after just over a year, saying he wants to spend more time with his childr...

item.title: Tesla shuts down Dojo, the AI training supercomputer that Musk said would be key to full self-driving
item.description: The disbanding of Tesla’s Dojo efforts follows the departure of around 20 workers, who left the automaker to start their own AI company dubbed Density...

item.title: How to use Instagram Map and set your location-sharing preferences
item.description: Following concerns about safety, Instagram head Adam Mosseri reassured users that the feature is opt-in, and noted that some people are “confused” abo...

item.title: The Best Colored Noise for Sleep (2025)
item.description: You may be familiar with white noise, but what about pink noise, or brown noise? WIRED’s sleep expert walks you through the rainbow of benefits for be...

item.title: Rocket Lab eyes big defense opportunities with new acquisition
item.description: Rocket Lab is taking the concept of an 'end-to-end' space company to new heights with a forthcoming acquisition.

item.title: Mysterious Crime Spree Targeted National Guard Equipment Stashes
item.description: A string of US armory break-ins, kept quiet by authorities for months, points to a growing security crisis—and signs of an inside job.

item.title: High costs and thin margins threatening AI coding startups
item.description: Coding assistant startups are highly unprofitable, says a source familiar with Windsurf financials.

item.title: The 35 Best Movies on HBO Max Right Now (August 2025)
item.description: Final Destination Bloodlines, Sinners, and Get Out are just a few of the movies you should be watching on HBO Max this month.
